DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect date related to public knowledge and attitude towards biospecimen-based research and their willingness to participate in biobanking in China.
DOC.brief_title: Public Perception and Attitude of Chinese Towards Biomedical Research and Biobanking in China
DOC.criteria: individuals aged 18 years and above could understand the content of the questionnaire and express themselves voluntary to participate in this survey history of mental illness or the deaf not able to express their views and opinions clearly
